meta.description: The editor for the Zelda-like ARPG game engine, Solarus

license.fullName: GNU General Public License v3.0 only

meta.long_description:
Solarus is a game engine for Zelda-like ARPG games written in lua.
Many full-fledged games have been writen for the engine.
Games can be created easily using the editor.
meta.name: solarus-quest-editor
